name: Supermercado Cidon
description: Gourmet international supermarket in the heart of Portals Nous, offering a wide variety of premium food products, fresh produce, and imported goods. A local favourite for expats and residents since it caters to international tastes.
address: Plaza Portals s/n, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Eroski Santa Ponsa
description: Large branch of the Eroski supermarket chain conveniently located near Santa Ponsa beach. Offers a wide selection of groceries, household items, and fresh food at competitive prices.
address: Av Rei Jaume I / Gran Via Puig des Castellet, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: Farmacia Portals
description: Well-established pharmacy in Portals Nous operating since 1970, specialising in dermatology, nutricosmetics, homeopathy, and custom compounding. Open 12 hours a day, Monday to Saturday.
address: Ctra. Andratx, 30, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Farmacia Puerto Portals
description: Pharmacy located at the Puerto Portals roundabout, offering a full range of pharmaceutical products and health consultations. Convenient for residents of Bendinat, Portals Nous, and Costa d'en Blanes.
address: C/ Benito Feijoo, 10 (Rotonda Pto. Portals), 07181 Calvia

name: Mai Mai
description: Women's clothing and accessories boutique in the village centre of Portals Nous. Offers a curated selection of fashion and accessories in an upscale village setting.
address: Carrer d'Antoni Maria Alcover, 18, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Lullius Partners
description: Mallorca's leading boutique tax law firm, recognised as a market leader in private wealth and tax advice. Specialises in advising international clients, expats, and high-net-worth individuals on Spanish, cross-border, and international taxation.
address: Carrer Unio 10, 2A, 07001 Palma de Mallorca (serves Calvia area)

name: Januar Consulting
description: Established in 1957, Januar Consulting specialises in legal and tax advisory services for English-speaking clients in Mallorca. Offers tax consultancy, payroll accounting, legal advice, and Beckham Law guidance for expats.
address: Offices in Palma (+34 971 495 835) and Manacor (+34 971 553 161), serving all of Mallorca

name: Resitax
description: Tax and fiscal law firm in Mallorca with over 10 years of experience. Experts in international taxation, tax residency, non-resident fiscal matters, and digital nomad visa applications. Multilingual team serving expats and companies.
address: Passeig de Mallorca 14A, Entresuelos C y D, 07012 Palma (serves Calvia area)

name: Benavides Asociados
description: Multidisciplinary law firm offering comprehensive legal and tax solutions in Mallorca. Specialises in civil, criminal, commercial, and tax law, with particular expertise in real estate law for foreign investors and inheritance matters.
address: Offices in Pollensa and Palma de Mallorca (serves all Mallorca including Calvia)

name: Calvia Villa Service
description: Full-service property maintenance company based in Calvia offering plumbing, electrical work, waterproofing, leak repair, pool tiling, and general construction. Available 7 days a week with professional support.
address: Calvia, Mallorca

name: Mallorca Elite Services
category: Home Services - Cleaning, Pool & Garden Maintenance
description: Property maintenance company in Calvia offering professional cleaning services, garden and pool maintenance, refurbishments, repairs, and emergency services. Caters to villas and private properties throughout the Calvia area.
address: Gran Via 23, Calvia, Mallorca

name: Garden Service Mallorca
description: Professional garden and pool maintenance service covering Calvia, Andratx, and Paguera. Offers comprehensive pool cleaning, chemical treatment, pH/chlorine adjustment, plumbing, and garden care.
address: Calvia / Andratx area, Mallorca

name: Horizon Property Services
category: Home Services - Property Management & Pool Service
description: Property management company offering pool maintenance, garden care, house cleaning, and repair services across Mallorca. Provides weekly pool cleaning, water quality testing, and full property upkeep for homeowners.
address: Palma de Mallorca (serves southwest Mallorca including Calvia)

name: Agora Portals International School
description: Founded in 2008, Agora Portals was the first school in the Balearic Islands to offer the International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma Programme. Provides a multilingual education (English, Spanish, Catalan) from Early Years through Sixth Form, with strong emphasis on educational innovation.
address: Carretera Vella d'Andratx, s/n, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Baleares International College (BIC) - Sa Porrassa Campus
description: British-style international school offering education for boys and girls aged 3 to 18. Follows the British curriculum with a diverse international community. Located on the edge of open countryside in Sa Porrassa, Calvia. No entrance exams required.
address: Ctra. Cala Figuera, 3A, Sa Porrassa, 07181 Calvia

name: Spanisch Aktiv Mallorca
description: Spanish language school offering intensive courses, private lessons, and evening classes in Santa Ponsa and Palma. Courses for all levels from beginners to advanced, taught by qualified native Spanish speakers.
address: Calle Ramon de Moncada, 9, 07180 Santa Ponsa

name: Clinica Veterinaria Bendinat
description: English-speaking veterinary clinic established in 2003 by Nick Murgatroyd BVSc. Offers comprehensive pet care including consultations, surgery, diagnostics, and home visits. Popular with the international expat community. 24-hour emergency telephone available.
address: Plaza Bendinat, Calvia, Mallorca

name: Clinica Veterinaria CalviaVet
description: Highly rated veterinary clinic in Santa Ponsa, part of the Unavets network. Team includes professionals with experience from renowned centres in the UK and Mallorca. Wheelchair accessible facility with moderate pricing.
address: Gran Via Puig des Castellet 1, Local 5, Bloque 5, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: Clinica Veterinaria Santa Ponsa
description: Local veterinary clinic in Santa Ponsa offering consultations, vaccinations, surgery, and home care visits. Open Monday to Friday with a dedicated team of veterinary professionals.
address: Calle Riu Sil, 12, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: Animals Palmanova
description: Specialised pet supplies store in Palmanova, operating since 1996. Offers premium brand pet food, accessories, and expert advice for dogs, cats, and other pets.
address: Palmanova, Calvia

name: Cappuccino Grand Cafe Puerto Portals
description: Iconic, stylish all-day cafe set in the glamorous Puerto Portals marina. Part of the renowned Grupo Cappuccino chain, serving premium coffees, iced drinks, breakfast, and an extensive food menu. Open from morning until midnight.
address: Puerto Portals, 1, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Cocos Deli
description: Popular healthy cafe, deli, and juice bar in the village of Portals Nous. Serves nourishing breakfast, brunch, and lunch with a focus on fresh, organic ingredients. Daily changing deli fridge and homemade cakes. Available to eat in or take away.
address: Ctra. Andratx, 30, Local 7, 07181 Portals Nous, Calvia

name: The French Coffee Shop
description: Artisan French bakery and coffee shop near Portals Nous, fresh-baking daily for over 35 years. Known for outstanding spit roast chicken, fresh baguettes, pastries, and croissants. Popular with the yachting community and local residents alike.
address: Carrer Garcilaso de la Vega, 1, 07181 Costa d'en Blanes / Portals Nous, Calvia

name: Le Cafe Flora
description: Charming French-style breakfast and brunch cafe in Santa Ponsa. Highly rated (4.7/5 on TripAdvisor) for its Nutella crepes, fresh pastries, and quality coffee. Open daily from 8:30am to 3:00pm.
address: Calle Ramon de Montcada, 19, Local 8, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: FC Rent a Car
description: Family-owned car rental company based in the Calvia area, covering Magaluf, Palmanova, and Santa Ponsa. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Two office locations in the Calvia area.
address: Av. Notari Alemany, 30, Local 14, 07181 Magaluf, Calvia

name: Rosslind Rent a Car
description: Well-established car rental provider in Mallorca based in Santa Ponsa. Offers a combination of experience, technology, and personal service. Also operates as High Class Cars for premium vehicle rentals. Airport pick-up available.
address: Calle Puig des Teix, 6, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: Hiper Rent a Car - Santa Ponsa Office
description: Branch of the well-known Mallorca-based car rental chain, founded over 40 years ago. The Santa Ponsa office is conveniently located near the beach and offers a wide range of vehicles at competitive prices.
address: Calle Ramon de Moncada, 9, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Calvia

name: Taller Autobody Balear
category: Car Rental / Automotive - Mechanic / Body Shop
description: Auto repair and body shop located in the Son Bugadelles industrial area of Calvia. Offers mechanical repairs, bodywork, painting, and pre-ITV inspections. Rated 5/5 on Yelp.
address: Carrer Valencia, 25 (Poligono Son Bugadelles), 07183 Calvia

name: Waypoint Palmanova
category: Car Rental / Automotive - Car Wash & Service Centre
description: Automotive service centre in Palmanova offering car wash, car repair, tyre replacement, ITV (MOT) service, and an auto parts shop. A one-stop shop for vehicle maintenance needs.
address: Carrer Miguel de Santos Oliver, 6, 07181 Palmanova, Calvia

name: Farmacia Frau Moreno
description: Pharmacy located in Santa Ponsa serving the local community with pharmaceutical products, health consultations, and everyday health essentials. Convenient location on the main Gran Via thoroughfare.
address: Avenida Gran Via Puig de Galatzo, Santa Ponsa, Calvia
